description:
Flats happen, even with tubeless tires. This little kit makes sealing up holes in your tire, nice and simple. Where the TPT-1 stands out from other tire plug tools is how you get the “bacon strip” to stay in the tire. By adding a simple sliding retainer, Park’s TPT-1 lets you hold the plug in place while removing the tool from the tire, no more pulling the plug out with the tool.

  • All in one design tucks nicely in saddle bags, hip packs, and jersey pockets
  • Sliding plug remover makes an easy job even easier
  • Includes 5 vulcanized rubber tire plugs
  • Dimensions: 8.9 x 2.7 x 4cm
name: Park Tool TPT-1 Tubeless Tire Plug Tool
